department.ch: 土木工程學系營建管理碩士班
department.en: Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering

goal.ch:
“The objectives of this course are:
(1) help equip students with basic concepts of quality management in construction, and
(2) familiarize students with common statistical and analytical approachs and tools for quality management.“
goal.en:
“The objectives of this course are:
(1) help equip students with basic concepts of quality management in construction, and
(2) familiarize students with common statistical and analytical approachs and tools for quality management.“

outline.ch:
1. Introduction to quality management
2. Quality planning
3. Statistical methods and applications.
4. Quality analytical methods and applications.
5. Quality House
6. Failoure Mode and Effect Analysis (FMEA)
7. Quality assurance and audit
outline.en:
1. Introduction to quality management
2. Quality planning
3. Statistical methods and applications.
4. Quality analytical methods and applications.
5. Quality House
6. Failoure Mode and Effect Analysis (FMEA)
7. Quality assurance and audit

gradMethod.ch:
Homework assignments: 30％
Final project (written report and 10-minute presentation): 30％
Impromptu quiz: 5％
Final exam: 25％
Class participation: 5％
Attendance: 5％ (One absence for any reasons is allowed. Each absence since the second time results in 1％ mark deduction. Late for class twice is counted as one absence)
gradMethod.en:
Homework assignments: 30％
Final project (written report and 10-minute presentation): 30％
Impromptu quiz: 5％
Final exam: 25％
Class participation: 5％
Attendance: 5％ (One absence for any reasons is allowed. Each absence since the second time results in 1％ mark deduction. Late for class twice is counted as one absence)

domain.en:

ch.competencies: 具備營建管理專業能力
具備獨立研究及創新思考能力
具備專案執行及團隊合作領導能力
具備永續與國際觀及社會服務能力
具備國際論文發表之能力

en.competencies: Capability of independent research and innovative thinking
Capability of executing a project and leading the team work
Capability of serving the society with a vision of globalization and sustainability
Capability of presenting and publishing papers in international conferences

ch: 系所:限土木工程學系營建管理碩士班。年級:限一年級。
系所:限土木工程學系營建管理博士班。
en: Department:Master‘s Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.Year:First Year only.
Department:Ph.D. Program in Construction Management, Department of Civil Engineering only.
